title: The sex scene that was left out. For good reason of course. How it was handled
review: The boy who breaks his arm get s a cast. The girl writes losers on it. But after that he changes it to Lovers. You don't really notice until the end after they leave the well house. You see it before but the director made an effort to show it again. That's why the boy's cast says Lovers. He wrote a V over the S. pretty much explains what they all are. They are Losers and then Lovers!
